itemInfo.itemDesc: An earring decorated with a Resplendent Ruby.

item.name: Ruby Earrings
item.desc: An earring decorated with a Ruby.

item.name: Melted Iron Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Iron Ore.

item.name: Ruby
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding a Rough Ruby.

item.name: Blood Ruby Earrings
item.desc: An earring decorated with a Blood Ruby.
